articles.author: Aliza Chasan
articles.title: What to know about March's full "Blood Worm Moon," a total lunar eclipse - CBS News
articles.description: Viewers across North America will get to enjoy a full Blood Worm Moon during a total lunar eclipse on March 13 into March 14.
articles.content:
Astronomy fans are in for a treat this March as the full moon will appear to turn red during a total lunar eclipse.
March's full moon, known as the Worm Moon, will pass into Earth's shadow on the ni… [+3082 chars]
